snippet.title: Plantasia Dev Talks: Meet Ayla, Creative Director + Founder!
snippet.description:
Plantasia Dev Talks: Meet Ayla, the Cave Bear Games Founder & Creative Director! 🌿

In our very first Plantasia Dev Talk, we’re spotlighting Ayla—the creative force behind Plantasia and the founder of Cave Bear Games! 

Hear Ayla share her journey into games, her inspiration for starting the studio, and how she’s turned her vision into the world of Plantasia.

🔗 Wishlist Plantasia on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/3236330/Plantasia/
👉 Join our Discord server: https://discord.com/invite/e7meFZrBUn

-----

Timestamps: 
00:00 Intro to Plantasia
00:50 What makes Plantasia unique?
03:36 Plantasia feature you're most proud of
06:24 Games as a career
07:53 Developing skills at CBG
10:25 CBG Studio Pillars
14:15 Advice for starting
16:28 Unexpected Challenges
18:49 Working in the game industry as a junior
